General.Name: PP PRIME Public Company Limited
General.Description: PP PRIME Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes feeds for aquatic animals and pets feed in Thailand and Japan. It operates through Aquatic Animal Feed, Pet Food, and Electricity Generation and Distribution segments. The company offers black tiger and other shrimp feed products; fish feed products; and dog, cat, and other pet food products. It also engages in the geothermal and wing power generation business; and consulting and management business. The company was formerly known as Thai Luxe Enterprises Public Company Limited and changed its name to PP PRIME Public Company Limited in September 2018. PP PRIME Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Khao Yoi, Thailand.
